verses.roman:
rājāra ājñāya paḍichā pāṭhāya dine-dine
bahuta prasāda pāṭhāya diyā bahu-jane

synonyms: rājāra ājñāya—by the order of the King; paḍichā—the superintendent of the temple; pāṭhāya—sent; dine-dine—day after day; bahuta prasāda—a large quantity of food; pāṭhāya—he sent; diyā bahu-jane—carried by many persons.
translation: Following the King's orders, the superintendent of the temple sent large quantities of prasāda every day, and it was carried by many persons.
